## \_disableControlsWithNoValue() function

Responsible for creating a [DisabledControls](./dynamic-forms.disabledcontrols.md) object where form values that are null or undefined will be disabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _disableControlsWithNoValue<T>(formValue: T, disableAll?: boolean): DisabledControls<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  formValue | T | The value of the form T |
|  disableAll | boolean | Set to true if all controls should be disabled |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DisabledControls](./dynamic-forms.disabledcontrols.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

A map of disabled controls
